head.title: File:Flag of Scotland.svg - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Scotland_svg skin-vector

div.div: Full resolution‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,000 × 600 pixels, file size: 231 B)

div.p:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.div: English: Flag of Scotland. Ratio 3:5. The blue used is "royal" blue (Pantone 300), following the Scottish Parliament's recommendation of 2003. See also the traditional colour: Image:Flag of Scotland (traditional).svg.

a.title: ja:スコットランドの国旗

div.a: スコットランドの国旗

td.span: (update: restore DOCTYPE element, put clipPath in defs element, use proper URI reference)

td.span: (add proper XML heading (SVG source) (image now renders in Firefox))

td.span: (Removing border (surely, that is not part of the flag!))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 14:48, 26 October 2005

td.span: (== Summary == Flag of Scotland. Ratio 3:5. The blue used is "royal" blue (Pantone 300), following the Scottish Parliament's recommendation of 2003. The author is K. Bolino (kbolino@sdf.lonestar.org). This document was released into the pub)
